title: Saishuu Heiki Kanojo: Another Love Song
synopsis: Before Chise became the "ultimate weapon," there was anotherâ€”Lieutenant Mizuki. A battle-hardened military woman, she volunteered for an experimental procedure after injuries left her unable to return to the battlefield. As the prototype ultimate weapon, Lieutenant Mizuki was highly successful on the battlefield, however, as the first candidate, her development was limited.
